comments.body: Ha, I was about to say, it's a backwards compatible change to add it, no? If we don't need it, why have it?
Is this field perfectly in sync? Are there windows of time when it's possible to read an incorrect value? How long are they?
API servers won't serve write operations until they update the storageVersion object to reflect the latest, so this field is perfectly in sync.
Can you make the comment explain that?
